/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. The road itself is divided by a concrete barrier, ensuring the safety of the drivers and pedestrians. On the right side of the road, cars are neatly parked, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. 

On the left side of the road, a bus stop waits patiently for its next visitors. The buildings in the background, though not clearly visible, add to the urban charm of the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the life of a busy city like Beijing.
